key.name: icon-size
key.description: Default size of desktop icons in grid cells: 1x1, 2x2, 3x3, 4x4

key.name: show-hidden
key.description: Display hidden files and folders (starting with a dot)

key.name: grid-columns
key.description: Number of columns in the desktop grid

key.name: grid-rows
key.description: Number of rows in the desktop grid

key.name: grid-visible
key.description: Display the grid lines on the desktop

key.name: grid-color
key.description: Color of grid lines in CSS format

key.name: grid-line-width
key.description: Width of grid lines in pixels

key.name: grid-dots-only
key.description: Show only dots at grid intersections instead of full lines

key.name: grid-line-pattern
key.description: Pattern of grid lines: solid, dashed, dotted

key.name: grid-spacing
key.description: Space between icons in pixels

key.name: icon-background-auto
key.description: Use dominant color from icon as background when icon is smaller than cell

key.name: sort-by
key.description: How to sort icons: name, modified, size, type

key.name: single-click
key.description: Open files with a single click instead of double click

key.name: show-trash
key.description: Display the trash can on the desktop

key.name: show-home
key.description: Display home folder icon on the desktop

key.name: custom-icon-sizes
key.description: JSON map of filenames to their custom sizes (small, medium, large, xlarge)

key.name: icon-positions
key.description: JSON map of filenames to their custom positions

key.name: icon-elevations
key.description: JSON map of filenames to their elevation level (0=flat, 1=low, 2=medium, 3=high)

key.name: icon-backgrounds
key.description: JSON map of filenames to their background style (none, light, dark, accent, auto)

key.name: default-elevation
key.description: Default elevation level for all icons (0=flat, 1=low, 2=medium, 3=high)

key.name: default-background
key.description: Default background style for all icons: none, light, dark, accent

key.name: icon-widgets
key.description: JSON map of filenames marked as widgets (true/false). Widgets have elevation, background, and can notify.

key.name: do-not-disturb
key.description: When enabled, all notifications are silenced (badges only, no popups)

key.name: max-notification-level
key.description: Maximum allowed notification level: silent, subtle, normal, attention, critical
